name: CreativeSet
desc: The basic details of a Creative Set.

items.name: id
items.desc: The unique identifier for the Creative Set.

items.name: name
items.desc: The name of the Creative Set.

items.name: adamId
items.desc: Each time you use an adamId in the API, it must match the adamId in your campaign. Use Get a Campaign or Get All Campaigns to obtain your adamId and correlate it to the correct campaign.

items.name: creativeSetAssets
items.desc: The assignment relationship between an asset and a Creative Set.

items.name: languageCode
items.desc: The language code that comes from the media response, such as en-US.

items.name: orgId
items.desc: The authorization organization. The unique identifier of the organization that owns the campaign. Your orgId is the same as your account in the Apple Search Ads UI.

items.name: status
items.desc: The user-controlled status to enable or pause the Creative Set.

items.name: statusReasons
items.desc: The reason for the Creative Set status. The reason returns only if the Creative Set status is invalid.
